meanings.definition: The state or quality of being inauspicious.
meanings.sent1: The inauspiciousnesses of the weather ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: The inauspiciousnesses of the situation made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent3: Despite the inauspiciousnesses of the forecast, we decided to go camping.
meanings.sent4: The inauspiciousnesses of the dark clouds loomed over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The inauspiciousnesses of the day lingered like a dark shadow.

meanings.definition: The lack of favorable circumstances or prospects.
meanings.sent1: She felt overwhelmed by the inauspiciousnesses of her job search.
meanings.sent2: The inauspiciousnesses of the economy affected everyone's financial stability.
meanings.sent3: The inauspiciousnesses of the situation seemed like a never-ending challenge.
meanings.sent4: The inauspiciousnesses of the road ahead made her hesitant to proceed.
meanings.sent5: The inauspiciousnesses of the news cast a shadow of uncertainty over the future.

meanings.sent1: The black cat crossing our path was seen as an inauspiciousnesses sign.
meanings.sent2: The broken mirror was considered an inauspiciousnesses omen.
meanings.sent3: Finding a four-leaf clover on Friday the 13th was an inauspiciousnesses twist of fate.
meanings.sent4: The howling of the lone wolf was an inauspiciousnesses sound in the night.
meanings.sent5: The inauspiciousnesses crow perched ominously on the roof.
